          -231.5279,231.248 -231.873,231.248 -0.3451,0 -104.688,
          -104.0616 -231.873,-231.248 z
        " fill="currentColor"></path></g></svg></div></div><div class="sc-jtiXyc bBXGSV api-content"><div class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu api-info"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs sc-dFRpbK kudwlS hDxFjs">API-SPORTS Widgets v3.1 <span>(3.1.0)</span></h1><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"></div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd" data-role="redoc-summary"></div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd" data-role="redoc-description"></div></div></div></div><div id="section/Introduction" data-section-id="section/Introduction" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Introduction" aria-label="section/Introduction"></a>Introduction</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>API-SPORTS widgets allow you to easily display <strong>dynamic sports data</strong> on your website.</p>
<p>They are designed to be:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Ultra-modular</strong>: each component is autonomous</li>
<li><strong>Customisable</strong>: language, theme, content, behaviour</li>
<li><strong>Easy to integrate</strong>: no framework required, a simple HTML tag is all you need</li>
</ul>
<p>They use request from your API-SPORTS account and work with <strong>all plans</strong>, including the free plan.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Introduction/Security" data-section-id="section/Introduction/Security" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Introduction/Security" aria-label="section/Introduction/Security"></a>Security</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>Our widgets use your account's API-KEY, which must be specified in the <code>data-key</code> attribute of your widget configuration.</p>
<p>When using these widgets it is important to be aware that your API-KEY will be visible to the users of your site, it is possible to protect yourself from this by allowing only the desired domains or IP in our <a href="https://dashboard.api-football.com/profile?access">dashboard</a>.
This way no one else can use your API-KEY for you. If you have already set up your widget and have not activated this option, you can reset your API-KEY and activate this option after.</p>
<p>You can further enhance security by completely hiding your API-KEY from the source code by following this <a href="https://www.api-football.com/news/post/how-to-optimize-widgets-cache-and-security-tutorial">tutorial</a>.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Introduction/Caching-Data" data-section-id="section/Introduction/Caching-Data" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Introduction/Caching-Data" aria-label="section/Introduction/Caching-Data"></a>Caching Data</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>By using Widgets, each visit to a page on your website triggers one or more API requests to retrieve data. Without a caching system, your daily quota can be reached very quickly.</p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong>
If a page triggers a single API request per visitor and you receive 80 visits to that page in one minute, this results in <strong>80 API requests</strong>. Over a full day, that can add up to <strong>115 200 requests</strong>.</p>
<p>By implementing a caching system, even with a very short duration, such as <strong>60 seconds</strong>, you can drastically reduce the number of requests. The first visit will trigger an API request, but the response will then be cached for the next 60 seconds. This means that if 80 visitors access the same page within that time frame, <strong>only the first request</strong> will reach the API, while the next 79 will be served directly from the cache.</p>
<p>With this system in place, you reduce usage from <strong>115 200</strong> requests per day to just <strong>1 440</strong>.</p>
<p>A full tutorial is available <a href="https://www.api-football.com/news/post/how-to-optimize-widgets-cache-and-security-tutorial">here</a>, explaining step by step how to set up an effective caching system.</p>
<img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/cache-data.png"></div></div></div><div id="section/Introduction/Debugging" data-section-id="section/Introduction/Debugging" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Introduction/Debugging" aria-label="section/Introduction/Debugging"></a>Debugging</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>If the widget does not display the requested information, it is possible to set the <code>data-show-errors</code> tag to <strong>true</strong> to display error messages directly in the widget and in the console. This can be due to several things like : <em>(Non-exhaustive list)</em></p>
<ul>
<li>You have reached your daily number of requests</li>
<li>Tags are incorrectly filled in</li>
<li>Your API-KEY is incorrect</li>
</ul>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Introduction/Logos-Images" data-section-id="section/Introduction/Logos-Images" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Introduction/Logos-Images" aria-label="section/Introduction/Logos-Images"></a>Logos / Images</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>Calls to logos/images do not count towards your daily quota and are provided for free. However these calls are subject to a <strong>rate per second &amp; minute</strong>, it is recommended to save this data on your side in order not to slow down or impact the user experience of your application or website. For this you can use <strong>CDNs</strong> such as <a href="https://bunny.net?ref=8r6al7jhm4">bunny.net</a>.</p>
<p>We have a tutorial available <a href="https://www.api-football.com/news/post/optimizing-sports-websites-bunnycdn-api-sports-image-storage-guide">here</a>, which explains how to set up your own media system with <strong>BunnyCDN</strong>. Once you have done this, all you need to do is to set the <code>data-logo-url</code> parameter with the URL of your CDN.</p>
<p>Logos, images and trademarks delivered through the API are provided solely for identification and descriptive purposes (e.g., identifying leagues, teams, players or venues). We does not own any of these visual assets, and no intellectual property rights are claimed over them. Some images or data may be subject to intellectual property or trademark rights held by third parties (including but not limited to leagues, federations, or clubs). The use of such content in your applications, websites, or products may require additional authorization or licensing from the respective rights holders. You are fully responsible for ensuring that your usage of any logos, images, or branded content complies with applicable laws in your country or the countries where your services are made available. We are not affiliated with, sponsored by, or endorsed by any sports league, federation, or brand featured in the data provided.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Introduction/All-available-widgets" data-section-id="section/Introduction/All-available-widgets" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Introduction/All-available-widgets" aria-label="section/Introduction/All-available-widgets"></a>All available widgets</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>Below is a list of all available widgets:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>games</code> → list of matches</li>
<li><code>game</code> → details of a match</li>
<li><code>team</code> → team profile</li>
<li><code>player</code> → player profile</li>
<li><code>standings</code> → league table</li>
<li><code>league</code> → schedule</li>
<li><code>leagues</code> → list of all leagues</li>
<li><code>h2h</code> → historical head-to-head</li>
<li><code>races</code>, <code>race</code>, <code>driver</code> → Formula 1</li>
<li><code>fights</code>, <code>fight</code>, <code>fighter</code> → MMA</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>Each widget adapts automatically based on the selected sport.</p>
</blockquote>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Before-You-Begin" data-section-id="section/Before-You-Begin" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Before-You-Begin" aria-label="section/Before-You-Begin"></a>Before You Begin</h1></div></div></div><div id="section/Before-You-Begin/Dynamic-targeting" data-section-id="section/Before-You-Begin/Dynamic-targeting" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Before-You-Begin/Dynamic-targeting" aria-label="section/Before-You-Begin/Dynamic-targeting"></a>Dynamic targeting</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>Some widgets, such as <code>games</code>, can dynamically open other widgets like <code>game</code>, <code>standings</code>, <code>player</code>, and more.<br>  This interaction is enabled using the <code>data-target-*</code> attributes.</p>
<p>  These attributes allow you to define <strong>where</strong> the opened widget should be rendered:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>modal</code> → renders the widget inside a modal.</li>
<li>CSS selector (<code>#id</code> or <code>.class</code>) → injects the widget into a specific HTML element on the page.</li>
</ul>
<p>  These targeting options are available for:</p>
<p>  <strong>General sports widgets (Football, Basketball, etc.):</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><code>data-target-game</code></li>
<li><code>data-target-standings</code></li>
<li><code>data-target-team</code></li>
<li><code>data-target-player</code></li>
<li><code>data-target-league</code></li>
</ul>
<p>  <strong>Formula 1 specific:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><code>data-target-race</code></li>
<li><code>data-target-ranking</code></li>
<li><code>data-target-driver</code></li>
</ul>
<p>  <strong>MMA specific:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><code>data-target-fight</code></li>
<li><code>data-target-fighter</code></li>
</ul>
<p>  <strong>Target a container by ID</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-html">  <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span> <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

  <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>div</span> <span class="token attr-name">id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>details<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>div</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

  <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>config<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-key</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>Your-Api-Key-Here<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-sport</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>football<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-target-game</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>#details<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
<p>  <strong>Target using modal</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-html">  <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span> <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

  <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>config<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-key</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>Your-Api-Key-Here<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-sport</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>football<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-target-game</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>modal<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Before-You-Begin/Language" data-section-id="section/Before-You-Begin/Language" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Before-You-Begin/Language" aria-label="section/Before-You-Begin/Language"></a>Language</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>The <code>data-lang</code> attribute allows you to easily switch the interface language of all widgets.</p>
<h4 id="available-languages">Available languages:</h4>
<ul>
<li><code>en</code> (English)</li>
<li><code>fr</code> (French)</li>
<li><code>es</code> (Spanish)</li>
<li><code>it</code> (Italian)</li>
</ul>
<p>  <strong>Example usage</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-html"><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>config<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-key</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>Your-Api-Key<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-sport</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>football<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-lang</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>en<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-custom-lang</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>https://yourdomain.com/lang/en.json<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>Example <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/lang.png"></p>
</blockquote>
<h4 id="custom-translations">Custom translations:</h4>
<p>  For complete control over wording, you can load your own translation file using <code>data-custom-lang</code>.<br>  This file must be a valid JSON object following the internal key structure.</p>
<p>  You can download the translation file <a href="https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0/en.json">here</a>.</p>
<p>  It allows you to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Override specific labels</li>
<li>Translate missing terms</li>
<li>Adapt terminology to your audience</li>
</ul>
<p>  Example JSON format:</p>
<pre><code class="language-json"><span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token string-property property">"all"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"All"</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="token string-property property">"live"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"Now Live"</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="token string-property property">"finished"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"Completed"</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="token string-property property">"scheduled"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"Coming Up"</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="token string-property property">"favorites"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"Favorites"</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>You can use <code>data-lang</code> and <code>data-custom-lang</code> <strong>together</strong>.<br>If a key is defined in both, the <strong>custom file will take priority</strong>.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>  <strong>Exemple for custom translation</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-html">  <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span> <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span> <span class="token attr-name">data-target-game</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>modal<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

  <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>config<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-key</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>Your-Api-Key-Here<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-sport</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>football<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-lang</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>custom<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token attr-name">data-custom-lang</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>https://yourdomain.com/lang/custom.json<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
<p>  You have a tutorial available <a href="https://www.api-football.com/news/post/create-a-custom-translation-file-for-your-widgets">here</a></p>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Before-You-Begin/Predefined-themes" data-section-id="section/Before-You-Begin/Predefined-themes" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Before-You-Begin/Predefined-themes" aria-label="section/Before-You-Begin/Predefined-themes"></a>Predefined themes</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>Four built-in themes are available by default. You can set them using the <code>data-theme</code> attribute on any widget.</p>
<ul>
<li><code>white</code> (default)</li>
<li><code>grey</code></li>
<li><code>dark</code></li>
<li><code>blue</code></li>
</ul>
<p>  Each theme adjusts background colors, text colors, button styles, borders, and more.</p>
  <div style="display: flex;gap: 0.25rem;">

<p>  <strong>White</strong><br>  <img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/white.png">
  <strong>Grey</strong><br>  <img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/grey.png"></p>
<p>  <strong>Dark</strong><br>  <img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/dark.png">
  <strong>Blue</strong><br>  <img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/blue.png">
  </p></div><p></p>
</div></div></div><div id="section/Before-You-Begin/Custom-theme" data-section-id="section/Before-You-Begin/Custom-theme" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#section/Before-You-Begin/Custom-theme" aria-label="section/Before-You-Begin/Custom-theme"></a>Custom theme</h2></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>You can override the default styles by creating your own CSS theme using the <code>data-theme</code> attribute and custom variable declarations.</p>
<p>  Example:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css"><span class="token selector">api-sports-widget[data-theme="MyTheme"]</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token property">--primary-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #18cfc0<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--success-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #2ecc58<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--warning-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #f39c12<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--danger-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #e74c3c<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--light-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #898989<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token property">--home-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> <span class="token function">var</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>--primary-color<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--away-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #ffc107<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token property">--text-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #333<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--text-color-info</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #333<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token property">--background-color</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> #fff<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token property">--primary-font-size</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 0.72rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--secondary-font-size</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 0.75rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--button-font-size</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 0.8rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--title-font-size</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 0.9rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token property">--header-text-transform</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> uppercase<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--button-text-transform</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> uppercase<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--title-text-transform</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> uppercase<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token property">--border</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 1px solid #95959530<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--game-height</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 2.3rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--league-height</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 2.35rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token property">--score-size</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 2.25rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--flag-size</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 22px<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--teams-logo-size</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 18px<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--teams-logo-size-xl</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 5rem<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token property">--hover</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> <span class="token function">rgba</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>200<span class="token punctuation">,</span> 200<span class="token punctuation">,</span> 200<span class="token punctuation">,</span> 0.15<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-html">    <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span> <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

    <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>div</span> <span class="token attr-name">id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>game-container<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>div</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

    <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
      <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>config<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
      <span class="token attr-name">data-key</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>Your-Api-Key-Here<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
      <span class="token attr-name">data-sport</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>football<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
      <span class="token attr-name">data-theme</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>MyTheme<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/Configuration" data-section-id="tag/Configuration" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Configuration" aria-label="tag/Configuration"></a>Configuration</h1></div></div></div><div id="tag/Configuration/paths/~1config/get" data-section-id="tag/Configuration/paths/~1config/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Configuration/paths/~1config/get" aria-label="tag/Configuration/paths/~1config/get"></a>Script &amp; Configuration </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><h4 id="insert-the-script">Insert the script</h4>
<p>To run our widgets, you must include this JavaScript file in your HTML page.</p>
<p>This script is necessary to load the web components used by all widgets <em>(games, player, standings, etc.)</em>.</p>
<pre><code class="language-html"><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>script</span> <span class="token attr-name">type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>module<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span> <span class="token attr-name">src</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0/widgets.js<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>script</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
<h4 id="insert-the-configuration-widget">Insert the configuration widget</h4>
<p>Global settings are defined with a single configuration widget <code>data-type="config"</code></p>
<p>This widget is required for our widgets to function and must be present on your HTML page.</p>
<p>It initialises the general settings <em>(API key, sport, language, theme, etc.)</em> for all other widgets on your page.</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">    <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
      <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>config<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
      <span class="token attr-name">data-key</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>Your-Api-Key-Here<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
      <span class="token attr-name">data-sport</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>football<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
    <span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>The configuration widget must be included only once, and all other widgets on the page will automatically inherit these settings, unless they are redefined locally.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Any configuration parameter that you do not add to your code will automatically take its default value.</p>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the configuration for widgets<br>
Must be the value <code>config</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-key"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-key</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Your <strong>API-KEY</strong> from the <a href="https://dashboard.api-football.com/">dashboard</a></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-sport"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-sport</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"football"</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"afl"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"baseball"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"basketball"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"f1"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"football"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"handball"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"hockey"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"mma"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"nba"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"nfl"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"rugby"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"volleyball"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the sport for the widgets.<br>
You can display multiple sports on the same page by setting the <code>data-sport</code> parameter directly in each widget.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-url-[sport]"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-url-[sport]</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Custom API URL for a given sport.<br>
Tutorial available <a href="https://www.api-football.com/news/post/how-to-optimize-widgets-cache-and-security-tutorial">here</a></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-lang"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-lang</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"en"</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"en"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"fr"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"es"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"it"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-custom-lang"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-custom-lang</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>URL of a custom translation JSON file.<br>
Tutorial available <a href="https://www.api-football.com/news/post/create-a-custom-translation-file-for-your-widgets">here</a></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-theme"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-theme</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"white"</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"white"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"grey"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"dark"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"blue"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-timezone"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-timezone</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"utc"</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the Timezone used by widgets.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-show-logos"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-show-logos</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Show logos in widgets when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-logo-url"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-logo-url</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Custom base URL for loading logos.<br>
Tutorial available <a href="https://www.api-football.com/news/post/optimizing-sports-websites-bunnycdn-api-sports-image-storage-guide">here</a></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-show-errors"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-show-errors</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Display errors in the console when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-favorite"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-favorite</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable favorites functionality when value is <code>true</code><br>
<strong>This feature uses cookies to function, so your users must accept cookies from your site beforehand</strong>.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/config</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/config</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-0" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-1" tabindex="0">Minimal Config</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-2" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-3">Full Config</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-4" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-5">Optimized Config</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-1" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-0"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK"><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>config<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-key</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>Your-Api-Key-Here<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-sport</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>football<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>script</span> <span class="token attr-name">type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>module<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span> <span class="token attr-name">src</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0/widgets.js<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>script</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-3" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-2"></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-5" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-4"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Leagues" data-section-id="tag/Leagues" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Leagues" aria-label="tag/Leagues"></a>Leagues</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>Leagues widgets offer an intuitive way to browse sports competitions and keep up with their evolution. The Leagues widget lists all leagues by country and offers quick access to favorites, while the League widget presents the full competition schedule with today’s games, results, upcoming matches and standings for a complete season overview.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/Leagues/paths/~1leagues/get" data-section-id="tag/Leagues/paths/~1leagues/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Leagues/paths/~1leagues/get" aria-label="tag/Leagues/paths/~1leagues/get"></a>Leagues </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>Baseball</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>Handball</code> <code>Hockey</code> <code>NFL</code> <code>Rugby</code> <code>Volleyball</code></p>
<p>Lists all leagues for the selected sport, grouped by country, with the option to favorite countries for quick access.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the leagues widget <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/leagues.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>leagues</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-league"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-league</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display league games</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/leagues</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/leagues</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-6" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-7" tabindex="0">Basic example</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-8" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-9">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-7" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-6"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK"><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>leagues<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-9" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-8"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Leagues/paths/~1league/get" data-section-id="tag/Leagues/paths/~1league/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Leagues/paths/~1league/get" aria-label="tag/Leagues/paths/~1league/get"></a>League </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>Baseball</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>Handball</code> <code>Hockey</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>NFL</code> <code>Rugby</code> <code>Volleyball</code></p>
<p>Displays the full schedule of a competition, divided into today's matches, completed matches, and upcoming matches.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the league widget <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/league.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>league</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-league"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-league</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-season"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-season</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define which season to display. Takes the last season by default.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-tab"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-tab</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"today"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"results"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"games"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"standings"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the tab to select when the widget opens.<br>
By default displays the first available tab containing data.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-standings"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-standings</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable standings when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-game"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-game</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display game details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT sc-gSYDnn eJvdeH dLEyPf keOPIh" kind="field" title="data-refresh"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><button aria-label="expand properties"><span class="property-name">data-refresh</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp jsXYTl" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string or integer</span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-gGLxEB dmLkmF dGJRan"> ≥15</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Auto-refresh interval in seconds, or <code>true</code> to use the default value. <code>false</code> to disable automatic update.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/league</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/league</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-10" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-11" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-12" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-13">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-11" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-10"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal config :
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>league<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-league</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Standings enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>league<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-league</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-standings</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With results tab selected by default
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>league<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-league</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-tab</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>results<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Refresh enabled to 20s
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>league<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-league</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-refresh</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>20<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-13" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-12"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Games" data-section-id="tag/Games" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Games" aria-label="tag/Games"></a>Games</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>With the Games widgets, users can keep track of matches in real time and access in-depth information. The Games widget offers an overview of scheduled, live and completed games, while the Game widget focuses on a single match with detailed stats and events. The H2H widget highlights the historical record between two teams for quick and easy comparison.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/Games/paths/~1games/get" data-section-id="tag/Games/paths/~1games/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Games/paths/~1games/get" aria-label="tag/Games/paths/~1games/get"></a>Games </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>Baseball</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>Handball</code> <code>Hockey</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>NFL</code> <code>Rugby</code> <code>Volleyball</code></p>
<p>Display the list of games grouped by competition according to the parameters used.</p>
<p>The matches are automatically updated according to the selected frequency <code>data-refresh</code>.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example  <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/games.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>games</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-date"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-date</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-gGLxEB dmLkmF dGJRan">YYYY-MM-DD</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-league"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-league</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Filter games by league ID(s), using one or more values separated by dashes</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-country"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-country</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Filter games by country</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT sc-gSYDnn eJvdeH dLEyPf keOPIh" kind="field" title="data-refresh"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><button aria-label="expand properties"><span class="property-name">data-refresh</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp jsXYTl" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string or integer</span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-gGLxEB dmLkmF dGJRan"> ≥15</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Auto-refresh interval in seconds, or <code>true</code> to use the default value. <code>false</code> to disable automatic update.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-show-toolbar"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-show-toolbar</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Show the top toolbar when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-tab"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-tab</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"all"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"live"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"finished"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"scheduled"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the tab to select when the widget opens.<br>
By default displays the first available tab containing data.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-games-style"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-games-style</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">1</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">1</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">2</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Defines whether games are displayed on one or two lines.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-game"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-game</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display game details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-standings"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-standings</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display standings</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/games</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/games</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-14" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-15" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-16" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-17">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-15" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-14"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With the date parameter
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-date</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>YYYY-MM-DD<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With the league parameter
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-league</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39-253<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With the country parameter
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-country</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>England<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Refresh enabled to 15s
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-refresh</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>15<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Switch to the compact single-line game layout
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-games-style</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>2<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With live tab selected by default
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-tab</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>live<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With no toolbar
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>games<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-show-toolbar</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>false<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
