<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-17" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-16"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Games/paths/~1game/get" data-section-id="tag/Games/paths/~1game/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Games/paths/~1game/get" aria-label="tag/Games/paths/~1game/get"></a>Game </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>Baseball</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>Handball</code> <code>Hockey</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>NFL</code> <code>Rugby</code> <code>Volleyball</code></p>
<p>Display full detail of a game. Except for football, you will need to enable tabs of this widget using parameters.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the game widget <br>
<img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/game.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>game</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-game-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-game-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT sc-gSYDnn eJvdeH dLEyPf keOPIh" kind="field" title="data-refresh"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><button aria-label="expand properties"><span class="property-name">data-refresh</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp jsXYTl" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string or integer</span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-gGLxEB dmLkmF dGJRan"> ≥15</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Auto-refresh interval in seconds, or <code>true</code> to use the default value. <code>false</code> to disable automatic update.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-game-tab"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-game-tab</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"events"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"statistics"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"lineups"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"players"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"scores"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"rosters"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the tab to select when the widget opens.<br>By default displays the first available tab containing data.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-team-statistics"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-team-statistics</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable team statistics when value is <code>true</code></p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>Basketball</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>NFL</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-player-statistics"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-player-statistics</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable player statistics when value is <code>true</code></p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>Basketball</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>NFL</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-events"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-events</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable events when value is <code>true</code></p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>Hockey</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>NFL</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-quarters"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-quarters</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable quarters scores when value is <code>true</code></p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>AFL</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-team"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-team</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display team details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-player"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-player</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display player details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/game</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/game</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-18" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-19" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-20" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-21">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-19" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-18"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>game<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-game-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Refresh enabled to 20s
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>game<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-game-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-refresh</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>20<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With statistics tab selected by default
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>game<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-game-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-game-tab</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>statistics<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With team statistics enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>game<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-game-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-statistics</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With player statistics enabled

  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-statistics</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With events enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>game<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>

// With quarters enabled

</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-21" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-20"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Games/paths/~1h2h/get" data-section-id="tag/Games/paths/~1h2h/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Games/paths/~1h2h/get" aria-label="tag/Games/paths/~1h2h/get"></a>Head to Head </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>Baseball</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>Handball</code> <code>Hockey</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>NFL</code> <code>Rugby</code> <code>Volleyball</code></p>
<p>Display historical matches between two teams based on their IDs.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the h2h widget <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/h2h.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>h2h</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-h2h"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-h2h</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Example: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">data-h2h=33-34</span></div><div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-game"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-game</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display game details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-standings"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-standings</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display standings</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/h2h</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/h2h</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-22" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-23" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-24" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-25">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-23" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-22"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>h2h<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-h2h</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>33-34<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-25" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-24"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Standings" data-section-id="tag/Standings" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Standings" aria-label="tag/Standings"></a>Standings</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>The Standings widget provides a quick and complete view of league tables for any season, making it easy to track team rankings and performance at a glance.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/Standings/paths/~1standings/get" data-section-id="tag/Standings/paths/~1standings/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Standings/paths/~1standings/get" aria-label="tag/Standings/paths/~1standings/get"></a>Standings </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>Baseball</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>Handball</code> <code>Hockey</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>NFL</code> <code>Rugby</code> <code>Volleyball</code></p>
<p>Displays the standings of a league for a given season, including team ranks, points and forms.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the standings widget <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/standings.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>standings</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-league"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-league</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-season"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-season</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define which season to display.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-team"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-team</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display team details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/standings</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/standings</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-26" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-27" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-28" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-29">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-27" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-26"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>standings<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-league</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-season</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>2024<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-29" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-28"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Teams" data-section-id="tag/Teams" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Teams" aria-label="tag/Teams"></a>Teams</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>The Team widget lets users dive into comprehensive team information, including statistics, roster details and venue data.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/Teams/paths/~1team/get" data-section-id="tag/Teams/paths/~1team/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Teams/paths/~1team/get" aria-label="tag/Teams/paths/~1team/get"></a>Team </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>Baseball</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>Handball</code> <code>Hockey</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>NFL</code> <code>Rugby</code> <code>Volleyball</code></p>
<p>Show detailed information about a team: venue, statistics, and squad.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the team widget
<br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/team.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>team</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-team-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-team-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-team-tab"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-team-tab</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"statistics"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"squads"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"venue"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the tab to select when the widget opens.<br>By default displays the first available tab containing data.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-team-statistics"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-team-statistics</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable team statistics when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-team-squad"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-team-squad</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable team squad when value is <code>true</code></p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>Basketball</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>NFL</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-player"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-player</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display player details.<br>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)  </p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>NFL</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/team</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/team</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-30" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-31" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-32" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-33">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-31" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-30"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>team<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With squads tab selected by default
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>team<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-tab</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>squads<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With team statistics enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>team<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-statistics</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With team squads enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>team<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>39<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-squads</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-33" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-32"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Players" data-section-id="tag/Players" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Players" aria-label="tag/Players"></a>Players</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>With the Player widget, users can explore detailed information about a player, from personal profile and performance stats to injuries and trophies.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/Players/paths/~1player/get" data-section-id="tag/Players/paths/~1player/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Players/paths/~1player/get" aria-label="tag/Players/paths/~1player/get"></a>Player </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p><strong>Sports covered</strong> <code>Football</code> <code>AFL</code> <code>NBA</code> <code>NFL</code></p>
<p>Displays detailed information about a player, including personal profile, season statistics, injuries, and career trophies. It provides a clear overview of appearances, goals, ratings, and other key metrics.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the player widget
<br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/player.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>player</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-player-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-player-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-season"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-season</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Required for <code>AFL</code> and <code>NFL</code> or to enable player injuries for <code>Football</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-player-statistics"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-player-statistics</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable player statistics when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-player-trophies"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-player-trophies</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable player trophies when value is <code>true</code></p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>Football</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-player-injuries"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-player-injuries</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable player injuries when value is <code>true</code> (requires the <code>data-season</code> parameter)</p>
<p><strong>Works only with</strong> <code>Football</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/player</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/player</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-34" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-35" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-35" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-34"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>player<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>456<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With player statistics enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>player<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>456<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-statistics</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With player trophies enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>player<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>456<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-trophies</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With player injuries enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>player<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>456<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-player-injuries</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-season</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>2025<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Formula-1" data-section-id="tag/Formula-1" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Formula-1" aria-label="tag/Formula-1"></a>Formula-1</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>The Formula 1 widget lets you experience the F1 season from start to finish. From practice sessions and qualifying to sprints and the main race, every Grand Prix can be followed in detail. Each event includes full rankings, the fastest lap, the starting grid, and pit stops. It also provides driver and team standings, offering a clear overview of the current season.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1races/get" data-section-id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1races/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Formula-1/paths/~1races/get" aria-label="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1races/get"></a>Races </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p>List of all Formula 1 races available for the selected season.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the races widget  <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/races.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>races</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-season"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-season</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define which season to display. Takes the last season by default.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-tab"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-tab</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"all"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"live"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"finished"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"scheduled"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the tab to select when the widget opens.<br>
By default displays the first available tab containing data.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-rankings"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-rankings</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable rankings in the widget when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-race"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-race</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display race details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/races</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/races</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-36" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-37" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-38" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-39">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-37" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-36"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>races<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With live tab selected by default
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>races<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-tab</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>live<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Rankings enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>races<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-rankings</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-39" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-38"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1race/get" data-section-id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1race/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Formula-1/paths/~1race/get" aria-label="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1race/get"></a>Race </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p>Show complete detail of a Formula 1 race: results, timings, and podium.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the race widget  <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/race.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>race</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-race-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-race-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-rankings"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-rankings</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable <strong>rankings</strong> tab when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-fastest-laps"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-fastest-laps</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable <strong>fastest laps</strong> tab when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-starting-grid"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-starting-grid</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable <strong>starting grid</strong> tab when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-pit-stops"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-pit-stops</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable <strong>pit stops</strong> tab when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-driver"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-driver</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display driver details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/race</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/race</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-40" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-41" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-42" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-43">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-41" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-40"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>race<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-race-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With rankings enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>race<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-race-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-rankings</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With fastest laps enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>race<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-race-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-fastest-laps</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With starting grid enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>race<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-race-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-starting-grid</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With pit stops enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>race<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-race-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-pit-stops</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-43" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-42"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1team-f1/get" data-section-id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1team-f1/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Formula-1/paths/~1team-f1/get" aria-label="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1team-f1/get"></a>Team </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p>Show detailed information about a team.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the team widget </p>
</blockquote>
<p><br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/team-f1.png"></p>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>team</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-team-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-team-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/team-f1</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/team-f1</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-44" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-45" tabindex="0">Basic example</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-45" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-44"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK"><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>team<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-team-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>5<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1driver/get" data-section-id="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1driver/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/Formula-1/paths/~1driver/get" aria-label="tag/Formula-1/paths/~1driver/get"></a>Driver </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p>Display stats and info about a Formula 1 driver.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the driver widget  <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/driver.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>driver</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-driver-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-driver-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-team"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-team</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display team details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/driver</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/driver</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-46" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-47" tabindex="0">Basic example</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-48" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-49">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-47" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-46"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK"><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>driver<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-driver-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
