<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-49" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-48"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/MMA" data-section-id="tag/MMA" class="sc-eCApnc chOOHy"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h1 class="sc-fujyAs kudwlS"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/MMA" aria-label="tag/MMA"></a>MMA</h1></div></div><div class="sc-hKFxyN bmhiuK"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd redoc-markdown "><p>With the MMA widgets, users can keep track of every fight whether it is past, live or upcoming. They provide detailed fight information such as scores and stats and give full access to fighter profiles and performance history.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tag/MMA/paths/~1fights/get" data-section-id="tag/MMA/paths/~1fights/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/MMA/paths/~1fights/get" aria-label="tag/MMA/paths/~1fights/get"></a>Fights </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p>Display the list of MMA fights.</p>
<p>The fights are automatically updated according to the selected frequency <code>data-refresh</code>.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the fights widget  <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/fights.png">"</p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>fights</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-games-style"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-games-style</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">1</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">1</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">2</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Fights display style.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT sc-gSYDnn eJvdeH dLEyPf keOPIh" kind="field" title="data-refresh"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><button aria-label="expand properties"><span class="property-name">data-refresh</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp jsXYTl" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string or integer</span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-gGLxEB dmLkmF dGJRan"> ≥15</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Auto-refresh interval in seconds, or <code>true</code> to use the default value. <code>false</code> to disable automatic update.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-show-toolbar"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-show-toolbar</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Show the top toolbar when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-tab"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-tab</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"all"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"live"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"finished"</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">"scheduled"</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Define the tab to select when the widget opens.<br>
By default displays the first available tab containing data.</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-fight"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-fight</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display fight details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/fights</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/fights</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-50" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-51" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-52" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-53">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-51" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-50"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fights<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Switch to the compact single-line game layout
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fights<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-games-style</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>2<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// Refresh enabled to 15s
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fights<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-refresh</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>15<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With live tab selected by default
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fights<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-tab</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>live<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With no toolbar
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fights<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-show-toolbar</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>false<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-53" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-52"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/MMA/paths/~1fight/get" data-section-id="tag/MMA/paths/~1fight/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/MMA/paths/~1fight/get" aria-label="tag/MMA/paths/~1fight/get"></a>Fight </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p>Show complete detail of a fight: scores, statistics.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the fight widget
<br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/fight.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>fight</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-fight-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-fight-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-fight-result"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-fight-result</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable fight result when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-statistics"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-statistics</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">boolean</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Default: </span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span></div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE dmLkmF"> Enum:</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">true</span> <span class="sc-laZMeE sc-ckTSus dmLkmF cDPDUw">false</span> </div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable statistics when value is <code>true</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-target-fighter"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-target-fighter</span></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Enable and define where to display fighter details</p>
<p>Can be set to <code>modal</code> or a CSS selector (e.g., <code>#details</code>, <code>.container</code>)</p>
</div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div class="sc-jSFjdj sc-gKAaRy dYGhuI fTsuzH"><div class="sc-EZqKI iONckA"><button class="sc-eEVmNe gXhEov"><span type="get" class="sc-fmdNqN izOCLq http-verb get">get</span><span class="sc-jXcxbT hVdkvA">/fight</span><svg class="sc-dIsUp bGRTXn" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 24 24" x="0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" y="0" aria-hidden="true" style="margin-right: -25px;"><polygon points="17.3 8.3 12 13.6 6.7 8.3 5.3 9.7 12 16.4 18.7 9.7 "></polygon></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="sc-ljsmAU IXrMk"><div class="sc-jlZJtj QgNfY"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div><div tabindex="0" role="button"><div class="sc-dTSzeu hyeqlU"><span>https://widgets.api-sports.io/3.1.0</span>/fight</div></div></div></div></div><div><h3 class="sc-kEqXSa cAMyfw"> Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-54" aria-selected="true" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-55" tabindex="0">Basic examples</li><li class="react-tabs__tab" role="tab" id="react-tabs-56" aria-selected="false" aria-disabled="false" aria-controls="react-tabs-57">Example with data-target</li></ul><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel react-tabs__tab-panel--selected" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-55" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-54"><div class="sc-ezzafa dvHFX"><div class="sc-giAqHp hIuvjA"><button><div class="sc-carFqZ hBWCUB">Copy</div></button></div><pre class="sc-bYwzuL sc-kLojOw daSkHC dByRlK">// Minimal
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fight<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-fight-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With fight result enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fight<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-fight-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-fight-result</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>

// With statistics enabled
<span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>api-sports-widget</span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>fight<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-fight-id</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>1234<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
  <span class="token attr-name">data-statistics</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>true<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span>
<span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>api-sports-widget</span><span class="token punctuation">&gt;</span></span>
</pre></div></div><div class="react-tabs__tab-panel" role="tabpanel" id="react-tabs-57" aria-labelledby="react-tabs-56"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="tag/MMA/paths/~1fighter/get" data-section-id="tag/MMA/paths/~1fighter/get" class="sc-eCApnc kzhJjR"><div class="sc-iCoGMd dolNKP"><div class="sc-hKFxyN hutltu"><h2 class="sc-pNWdM kfOTos"><a class="sc-crzoAE DykGo" href="#tag/MMA/paths/~1fighter/get" aria-label="tag/MMA/paths/~1fighter/get"></a>Fighter </h2><div class="sc-iGkqmO jEmHgI"><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI dYAYxd"><p>Display stats and info about a fighter.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Example of the fighter widget  <br><img src="https://api-sports-media-temp.b-cdn.net/widgets/fighter.png"></p>
</blockquote>
</div></div><div><h5 class="sc-iqAclL iupIzr">query Parameters</h5><table class="sc-hHEiqL iZJLLY"><tbody><tr class=""><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-type"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-type</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">string</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"><p>Must be set to <code>fighter</code></p>
</div></div></div></td></tr><tr class="last "><td class="sc-hBMUJo sc-fFSPTT eJvdeH dLEyPf" kind="field" title="data-fighter-id"><span class="sc-iemWCZ kMjgQu"></span><span class="property-name">data-fighter-id</span><div class="sc-oeezt sc-hhIiOg bkbCTW kXduun">required</div></td><td class="sc-bkbkJK gaTxIt"><div><div><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-iNiQyp dmLkmF isTLDY"></span><span class="sc-laZMeE sc-jffHpj dmLkmF lVyis">integer</span></div> <div><div class="sc-iJCRrE sc-ciSkZP ifDxYI wfptf"></div></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div><div Request samples </h3><div class="sc-cxNHIi jdxQrI" data-tabs="true"><ul class="react-tabs__tab-list" role="tablist"><li class="react-tabs__tab react-tabs__tab--selected" role="tab" id="react-tabs-58"
